aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by creating requests based on the allowed set of values for each of the mandatory tags

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by having actions based on the tag value associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by creating requests based on the presence of mandatory tags in the request

bedrock:InferenceProfileArn.description: Filters access by the specified inference profile

bedrock:ThirdPartyKnowledgeBaseCredentia.description: Filters access by the secretArn containing the credentials of the third party platform
